user.title: Connect to Strava
user.description:
Enter your Strava API credentials to link your account.

In the Strava developer portal set the callback URL to {callback_url} before continuing.

abort.already_configured: Only a single Strava Bike Maintenance entry is supported.

error.missing_external_url: Set an external URL under Settings → System → Network and use the same host in the Strava callback before continuing.

reset_wear_counter.name: Reset Wear Counter
reset_wear_counter.description: Reset a wear counter for the specified bike and part.

bike_id.name: Bike ID
bike_id.description: The Strava gear ID of the bike (e.g. b123456789).

part.name: Wear Part
part.description: Select which wear counter to reset.
